short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse with Head Movements, Correct Sitting Posture

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browse with Head Movements, Correct Sitting Posture.
Neckium use Tensorflow.js and web camera to identify your head movement, and control the browser for you with the detection.
For example, you can scroll a page by moving head vertically, switch a tab by moving horizontally
Neckium will also notify you if your sitting posture is not right or you have been sit there too long.
